summary: WIP - Meshes for Skyrim. Modders resource.
descriptionHtml:
THE DOWNLOAD FILE IS FOR MODDERS and MODELLERS ONLY!!!

I\'m working on some skyrim meshes.
I thought i\'ll post the WIP for people to have a look at and perhaps give me some suggestions.
Also, anyone who wishes to use these meshes for anything, can do so, bearing in mind i\'m altering Bethesda\'s meshes.

I built quite a few of my own meshes, but I was thinking maybe using/altering skyrim\'s default meshes may work out better. At least the textures are already availlable ?

Next to do:
Reshape/edit to a realistic shape.

================================
Posted obj file. Mesh is scaled at 10x and rotated/positioned to suit my workflow..
Hands and feet are joined, and will require splitting up prior to import to skyrim
Hands UV will need to be split up from body/feet.
author: Thor

files.name: Final Mesh - OBJ files and a few Morphs
